about_the_game:
Description of the Game

Paranormal Capture Investigation is a first-person horror game that plunges players into an oppressive atmosphere, forcing them to confront their deepest fears. Based on the developers' real-life personal experience, you'll need courage and insight to gather convincing evidence of the existence of ghosts, while surviving the terrifying ordeals that await you. Prepare to be haunted by unforgettable supernatural experiences in this exciting horror game. Will you dare to face the unknown?



Wander through sinister, still-inhabited houses, each teeming with paranormal phenomena.



Equip yourself with sophisticated detection equipment, such as EMF detectors, SpiritBoxes and temperature sensors, based on the knowledge acquired by our paranormal investigators, to collect evidence of the existence of the afterlife.



Participate in several paranormal investigations to unlock new locations with our progressive level and experience system.



Be prepared to face frightening apparitions and hostile spectres who will try to prevent you from discovering the truth.

Just Updated



Immerse yourself in the spine-chilling world of our horror game like never before with our Virtual Reality (VR) feature. By donning your VR headset, you'll be transported into a terrifying dimension where every creak, shadow, and eerie sound feels unbelievably real.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bits
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 Go of VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 1/2/3 (Air Link / Quest Link)

short_description: Become a paranormal investigator in Paranormal Capture Investigation! Play with your friends and discover the world of the paranormal. The game is developed on Unreal Engine 5 with the latest technology.
